info.name: Cowrie SSH Honeypot Detect
author: thesubtlety
info.description: Cowrie is a medium to high interaction SSH and Telnet honeypot designed to log brute force attacks and the shell interaction performed by the attacker. In medium interaction mode (shell) it emulates a UNIX system in Python, in high interaction mode (proxy) it functions as an SSH and telnet proxy to observe attacker behavior to another system.

response:
SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_8.2p1 Ubuntu-4ubuntu0.5
Invalid SSH identification string.
